text: The following is a list of presidents of Cape Verde, since the establishment of the office of president in 1975. == List of officeholders == Portrait Name Elected Term of office Political party Took office Left office Time in office 1 Aristides Pereira — 8 July 1975 22 March 1991 PAIGC 1 Aristides Pereira — 8 July 1975 22 March 1991 PAICV 2 António Mascarenhas Monteiro 1991 1996 22 March 1991 22 March 2001 years MpD 3 Pedro Pires 2001 2006 22 March 2001 9 September 2011 PAICV 4 Jorge Carlos Fonseca 2011 2016 9 September 2011 9 November 2021 MpD 5 José Maria Neves 2021 9 November 2021 Incumbent PAICV ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * World Statesmen – Cape Verde *
title: List of presidents of Cape Verde
